title: Game mode selection screw ups.
body:
I don't know if I have the occasional brain fart or if the client just like to mess with me now and again. I just picked the 3rd option from the left (which clearly says ARAM) and somehow I end up in some ranked 3v3 flex (wtf is that even?).

I went back there and don't see any option for a 3v3 ranked flex, so what the fuck is going on?

Not to mention I dodge cause I have no idea what the hell is going on and get penalized.
